text: is it too much to ask to have the file name show under the thumbnails? I'm about to update an about us page that has 30 photos of people ... I have to click on the i icon to see which one is which ... I've been asking for this for a while now ... who's with me? :slightly_smiling_face:
Adding to this it would be amazing to have an easy way to figure out the backend name of a CTA
Especially when the client has 60 of them, all un-styled that say “Learn More”
How are you seeing into my nightmares?
I live in your nightmares apparently
don’t worry I’m sending professional help Pete, classifieds said his name was Mr. Kreugar but you can call him “Freddie”
I use it too. It turned out to be an unclosed CSS style in another module. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
